string.name: Current
string.item: \u2022 If current flow through the switch its output will be 1.
\u2022 Ohm Law is stated that the potential difference is directly propotional to the current. (V = IR)

string.name: Voltmeter
string.item: \u2022 A voltmeter is used to measure Potential Difference and connected in parallel.

string.name: Focal_Length
string.item: \u2022 If the object is placed beyond 2F of a convex lens, the image formed will be: (Real, Inverted and of same size as object).

string.name: Spring_system
string.item: \u2022 Formula for time period of spring mass system is: T = 2π√m/k .

string.name: Charges
string.item: \u2022 If we double the distance between two charges,the change in the force between them: (1/4) .

string.name: Nuclear_physics
string.item: \u2022 The process of breaking a heavy nucleus after the bombardment of neutrons into two small nuclei is called: (Nuclear Fission Reaction).

string.name: IT
string.item: \u2022 A group of instructions or a program which guides hardware to do work is called: (Software).

string.name: Transformer
string.item: \u2022 The relation between Voltage, Current and Number of turns of Primary and Secondary coil is: (Np/Ns = Vp/Vs = Ip/Is).

string.name: Waves
string.item: \u2022 (Transverse waves) are the waves in which particles of the medium vibrate perpendicular to the direction of propagation of waves.

string.name: Pendulum
string.item: \u2022 Time period of simple pendulum is T = 2π √(L/g).

string.name: Electrical
string.item: \u2022 Mathematical relationship between critical angle C and refractive index N is:( N = 1 / sin c ) .

string.name: Quantity
string.item: \u2022 The device which converts digital quantities into analog quantities is called: ( DAC )

string.name: Light
string.item: \u2022 When light passes through a prism it deviates from its original path due to:( Refraction)
